description: The state funeral of Detective Garda Colm Horkan has been held in his home town in County Mayo.
title: Detective Garda Colm Horkan: State funeral held for 'dearly loved' officer
title_page: Detective Garda Colm Horkan: State funeral held for 'dearly loved' officer - BBC News
maintext: He said that when he first heard the report that an unnamed garda detective had died, he thought: "I pity the priest who has to do that funeral. Little did I think I would be that priest and that the detective garda was Colm."
